Chap. Twenty-Three - Self-Denial, Unselfishness, and Thoughtfulness

     Lessons That Are Needed in Every Home.--In every home there should be taught lessons of self-denial. Fathers and mothers, teach your children to economize. Encourage them to save their pennies for missionary work. Christ is our example. For our sakes He became poor, that we through His poverty might be made rich. He taught that all should come together in love and unity, to work as He worked, to sacrifice as He sacrificed, to love as the children of God.
